cloudnetworkrule.description: Represents an ingress or egress network rule.

action.description:
Defines the action to apply to a flow.
- `Allow`: allows the defined traffic.
- `Reject`: rejects the defined traffic; useful in conjunction with an allow all
policy.

groupTags.description: A list of tags to group resources.

localNetworks.description: A list of IP CIDRS that identify local endpoints.

localServiceTags.description: A list of Service Tags provided by the platform.

networks.description: A list of IP CIDRS that identify remote endpoints.

object.description:
Identifies the set of remote workloads that the rule relates to. The selector
will identify both processing units as well as external networks that match the
selector.

priority.description: Priority of the rule. Available only for cloud ACLs.

protocolPorts.description:
Represents the ports and protocols this policy applies to. Protocol/ports are
defined as tcp/80, udp/22. For protocols that do not have ports, the port
designation
is not allowed.

serviceTags.description: A list of Service Tags provided by the platform.

storedIPRanges.description: A list of ips range for internal use. Not visible to end users.

storedLocalNetworks.description:
An internal representation of the local networks to increase performance. Not
visible
to end users.

storedNetworks.description:
An internal representation of the networks to increase performance. Not visible
to end users.
